src:
FOTO: Selebriti Berbusana Terburuk di MTV EMA 2019
04 Nov 2019, 15:20 by AP, AFP, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia
Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Terkadang padu padan busana bukan hanya menghasilkan busana indah, tapi kadang juga aneh bahkan buruk.


Pabllo Vittar dari Brasil memilih dress floral untuk penampilannya di MTV EMA 2019. Namun cek bagian bawahnya, berlubang-lubang seperti tercabik. ( CRISTINA QUICLER / AFP)



Aktor Chile Jorge Lopez Astorga terlihat seperti tengah datang ke konser rock dibanding ke sebuah acara penghargaan (Photo by CRISTINA QUICLER / AFP)



Dibanding dengan datang ke acara penghargaan, mungkin Justina Valentine lebih cocok ke pesta seksi (Photo by CRISTINA QUICLER / AFP)



Baju Joan Smalls terlihat amat sederhana untuk sebuah pesta. Dia memang jelas menunjukkan kaki jenjangnya, namun dia terlihat seperti ingin ke pantai.  (Joel C Ryan/Invision/AP)



 Maruv mungkin masih terbawa suasana Halloween pekan lalu sehingga dia ingin bereinkarnasi menjadi kucing betina (Photo by Joel C Ryan/Invision/AP)



Jasmine Sokko mungkin juga lupa kalau Halloween sudah lewat. (Photo by Joel C Ryan/Invision/AP)



Sekilas tak ada yang salah dengan baju Halsey, namun pada kenyataannya di bagian belakangnya terlihat bajunya membuat dia tak nyaman dengan menampilkan area kulit 'terjepit'  (Photo by Joel C Ryan/Invision/AP)



Oversize memang tengah tren, namun Rosalia mungkin tak begitu paham ukuran oversize sehingga membuat dia jadi tenggelam  (Photo by Joel C Ryan/Invision/AP)
text:
PHOTO: The worst-dressed celebrity on MTV EMA 2019
04 Nov 2019, 15:20 by AP, AFP, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia
Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Sometimes the solid match does not only produce beautiful clothing, but sometimes it is also strange and even bad.


Pabllo Vittar from Brazil chose a floral dress for her appearance on MTV EMA 2019. But check the bottom, with holes as if torn. (CRISTINA QUICLER / AFP)



Chilean actor Jorge Lopez Astorga looks like he's coming to a rock concert instead of an awards show (Photo by CRISTINA QUICLER / AFP)



Compared to coming to the awards show, maybe Justina Valentine is more suited to a sexy party (Photo by CRISTINA QUICLER / AFP)



Joan Smalls's clothes look very simple for a party. He certainly showed his long legs, but he looked like he wanted to go to the beach. (Joel C Ryan / Invision / AP)



Maruv might still get carried away by Halloween last week so he wants to be reincarnated as a female cat (Photo by Joel C Ryan / Invision / AP)



Jasmine Sokko might also forget that Halloween is over. (Photo by Joel C Ryan / Invision / AP)



At first glance there is nothing wrong with Halsey's shirt, but in reality on the back of his shirt looks makes him uncomfortable by showing the area of the skin 'pinched' (Photo by Joel C Ryan / Invision / AP)



Oversize is indeed in the middle of a trend, but Rosalia may not really understand the size of oversize so that it makes it sink (Photo by Joel C Ryan / Invision / AP)
